title: ban
body: So I was wondering I wanted to know will riot ever unban ban accounts like I'm so curious

replies.body: The entire point of a perma-ban is to take away all potential access to an account. Revoking perma-bans (except in the rare case of a false positive) would be completely counter-intuitive to the entire system of perma-bans.
Then that would defeat the purpose of a "perma ban" you idiot, also your spelling and grammar make me want to vomit
Only if you're innocent:P I don't think permabanned accounts ever get unbanned unless you were falsely accused.
I hope they don't, you need to be a special kind of toxic to get perma'd.
